title: FF/Rewind with Left and Right buttons
custom_preconds:
1. Given user navigates to any video from home page or games page

2. And user opens the video/stream
custom_steps:
1. When user presses and holds left or right button

2.Then the scrubber point moves to the time forward or passed until enter or pause button is pressed
custom_expected: 1. Then the user sees the respective instance of the video, either the earlier or later part of it

title: UI: Limited scrubber options when Condensed Game selected
custom_preconds:
1. Given user navigates to Games page
2. And user selects an archived game tile
3. And user selects "Condensed Game"
custom_steps: 1. When user presses down button
custom_expected:
1. Then user cannot see the following as in Live or Archived Games:-
   
- Details
- Milestones
- Games
- Broadcast Options

2. User can see game title in this format "Condensed Game: <Team Initials>@<Team Initials> <m/dd/yy>"

3. User can Fast Forward/Rewind, Pause/Play video

4. User can turn on/off Closed Captions

title: Condensed Playback for Annually subscribed account
custom_preconds:
1. Given user opens the app
2. And user logs in with an annually subscribed account
3. Should not be a Blackout game
custom_steps:
1. When the user navigates to scores tab
2. And the user navigates and click the Game tiles->LIVE game tile
3. And the user clicks on Condensed option
custom_expected: Video streaming should start and video playback should start playing

title: Condensed Playback for free accounts
custom_preconds:
1. Given user opens the app
2. And user logs in with a free account
custom_steps:
1. When user navigates to a free game tile and presses enter
2. And user clicks on Condensed option
custom_expected: Then video streaming should start and video playback should start playing for condensed game

title: Condensed Video ends and goes to the game page
UI: Limited scrubber options when Recap Game selected
custom_preconds:
1. Given user navigates to Games page
2. And user selects an archived game tile
3. And user selects "Recap"
custom_steps: 1. When user presses down button
custom_expected:
1. Then user cannot see the following as in Live or Archived Games:-
   
- Details
- Milestones
- Games
- Broadcast Options

2. User can see game title in this format "<Team name> Vs. <Team name> Highlights"

3. User can Fast Forward/Rewind, Pause/Play video

4. User can turn on/off Closed Captions

title: Validate Resume for archived game - Hide Spoilers On
custom_preconds:
1. Given user opens app and logs in

2. And user turns enables Hide Spoilers

3. And user navigates to Games page

4. And user selects an archived game tile not played before
custom_steps:
1. When user picks a feed
2. And Fast forwards to an instance of the game and exits the video
3. And user picks the same game tile
custom_expected:
1. Then user cannot see the details for the following unless passed in video:-
   
- Details
- Milestones
- Games
- Broadcast Options

2. And user can see game title in this format "<Team Initials>@<Team Initials>"

3. And user sees "Resume" button

4. And after clicking on Resume button, the video begins from where user left off before exiting the video initially

5. Verify expected result step 1 passes

title: Validate Resume for archived game - Hide Spoilers Off
custom_preconds:
1. Given user opens app and logs in

2. And user turns Hide Spoilers off

3. And user navigates to Games page

4. And user selects an archived game tile not played before
custom_steps:
1. When user picks a feed
2. And Fast forwards to an instance of the game and exits the video
3. And user picks the same game tile
custom_expected:
1. Then user can see all details for the following in video:-
   
- Details
- Milestones
- Games
- Broadcast Options

2. And user can see game title in this format "<Team Initials>@<Team Initials>"

3. And user sees "Resume" button

4. And after clicking on Resume button, the video begins from where user left off before exiting the video initially

5. Verify expected result step 1 passes

title: Validate Watch From Beginning feature with Hide Spoilers Off
custom_preconds:
1. Given user turns off Hide Spoilers in Settings page

2. And user navigates to Games page

3. And user selects an archived game tile not played before
custom_steps:
1. When user picks a feed

2. And Fast forwards to an instance of the game and exits the video

3. And user picks the same game tile and clicks on Watch From Beginning button
custom_expected:
1. Then the video begins from the beginning of the video

2. And the filling bar shows all inning markers regardless of which instant the video is in

3. And the time in video is 00:00

title: Validate Watch From Beginning feature with Hide Spoilers On
custom_preconds:
1. Given user turns on Hide Spoilers in Settings page

2. And user navigates to Games page

3.And user selects an archived game tile not played before
custom_steps:
1. When user picks a feed

2. And Fast forwards to an instance of the game and exits the video

3. And user picks the same game tile and clicks on Watch From Beginning button
custom_expected:
1. Then the video begins from the beginning of the video

2. And the time in video is 00:00

3. And the filling bar shows each inning marker only after the video has passed them

title: Validate display of Innings Markers with Hide Spoilers Off
custom_preconds:
1. Given user turns off Hide Spoilers in Settings page

2. And user navigates to Games page

3. And user selects any archived game tile
custom_steps: 1. When user picks a feed
custom_expected: 1. Then the video begins and the filling bar shows all inning markers regardless of which instant the video is in

title: Validate no display of Innings Markers with Hide Spoilers On
custom_preconds:
1. Given user turns on Hide Spoilers in Settings page

2. And user navigates to Games page

3. And user selects any archived game tile
custom_steps: 1. When user picks a feed
custom_expected: 1. Then the video begins and the filling bar shows only those inning markers which have passed in the video

title: Innings navigation with number input
custom_preconds:
1. Given user navigates to Games page

2. And user selects any archived game tile

3. And user picks a feed
custom_steps: 1. When user presses a number between 1-9 representing the inning
custom_expected: 1. Then the video jumps to the time where the respective inning is

title: FF/Rewind
custom_preconds:
1. Given user navigates to Games page

2. And user selects any archived game tile

3. And user picks a feed
custom_steps: 1. When user presses and holds left or right button
custom_expected: 1. Then the scrubber point moves to the time until enter or pause is pressed

title: Start from Beginning
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has launched an archived game with Hide Scores enabled in the app settings

AND the user did not select the resume option
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the playback streaming
custom_expected: THEN the user will see that the archived game starts from the beginning of the stream

title: Game Data updates as game progresses
custom_preconds:
1. Given user opens MLB app
2. And User logs in with a valid account
3. And User turns Hide Spoilers on from Settings menu
custom_steps:
1. When user opens an archived game (Game of the Day if free account)
2. And navigates to Scores tab
custom_expected:
1. Then scores that have happened before the current timestamp only appear
2. And the score data refreshes within every 30 seconds

title: User is back to game page
custom_preconds:
1. Given user navigates to homepage as an entitled or non-entitled user
2. And navigates to a previous date in the to Games page
3. When user opens an archived game
custom_steps:
1. When user plays and watches the game for about 3 hours
2. And user waits until the game ends
custom_expected: 1. Then the user is navigated back to the page the game is accessed from

title: Ads will only appear during commercial breaks
custom_preconds:
1. Given user launches the MLB App
2. And user navigates to an archived game
custom_steps: 1. When user waits for the commercial break to take place
custom_expected:
1. Then user sees ads will only appear during commercial breaks
2. And user does not see commercial break card

title: Exiting a stream by pressing back button
custom_preconds:
1. Given user navigates to Games page

2. And user selects any archived game tile

3. And user picks a feed
custom_steps: 1. When user presses a back button once or twice
custom_expected: 1. Then the stream is exited and user lands on games page

title: Exiting a stream by pressing next game button to right of scrubber
custom_preconds:
1. Given user navigates to Games page

2. And user selects any archived game tile

3. And user picks a feed
custom_steps: 1. When user presses the button to the right with logos of two teams
custom_expected: Then user should be navigated to the respected game's stream

title: Switching between Audio feeds
custom_preconds:
1. Given user navigates to Games page

2. And user selects any archived game tile

3. And user picks a feed
custom_steps:
1. When user presses the down button twice
2. And navigates to the Broadcast Options tab
3. And navigates and presses enter on different audio feed
custom_expected: 1. Then the audio and commentator in the other audio feed should be different

title: Switching between Video feeds
custom_preconds:
1. Given user navigates to Games page

2. And user selects any archived game tile

3. And user picks a feed
custom_steps:
1. When user presses the down button twice
2. And navigates to the Broadcast Options tab
3. And navigates and presses enter on different video feed
custom_expected: 1. Then the stream switches to different video feed and audio is  different

title: Stat Button
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing an archived game
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enables the data stack button to display the box score and Out of town scoreboard
AND the user switches feeds from the out of town scoreboard
custom_expected: THEN the data stack with the box score and out-of-town scoreboard will remain enabled on the new feed's video player

title: Blackout
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing an archived game
custom_steps:
WHEN the user attempts to launch a game that is still live
OR the user attempts to launch another archived game with blackout tags less than 24 hours after completion
custom_expected: THEN the user will receive a blackout message stating they are not entitled to watch the feed

title: Validate non-entitled team game feed doesn't open
custom_preconds:
1. Given user opens the app
2. And user logs in with team subscriber account
3. And user navigates to recent archived game for subscribed team
custom_steps:
1. When user enters tile and sees subscribed team feed and opposing team feed
2. And the user selects opposing team feed
custom_expected: Then user is navigated to subscriber page

title: ES Device Language
custom_preconds: Given the user is switching their current video to another game
custom_steps: WHEN the new game’s video player launches
custom_expected: THEN the home team’s video and the spanish audio feed begins playing

title: Home Team
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is switching their current video to another game
custom_steps: WHEN the new game’s video player launches
custom_expected: THEN the home team’s video and audio feed will begin playing

title: Audio only user media selection
custom_preconds: GIVEN an entitled audio only user is logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks a video feed for the game
THEN the audio feed is selected, based on feeds available according to teams in game
custom_expected: THEN the audio changes and user notices differences in audio and speakers

title: Audio only users select audio
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is an audio only user
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects an audio feed to play, based on feeds available according to teams in game
custom_expected: THEN the media begins playback

title: VOD Scrubber quick actions
custom_preconds:
1. Given user opens the app
2. And user logs in with a valid account
3. When user opens a VOD game
custom_steps:
1. When user presses the up button once
2. Then the scrubber bar appears
custom_expected: 1. Then user should see quick action buttons to the right of the scrubber

title: SVOD Scrubber quick actions
custom_preconds:
1. Given user opens the app
2. And user logs in with a valid account
3. When user opens a SVOD game
custom_steps:
1. When user presses the up button once
2. Then the scrubber bar appears
custom_expected: 1. Then user should see quick action buttons to the right of the scrubber

title: FF/Rewind with Left and Right buttons
custom_preconds:
1. Given user navigates to any video from home page or games page

2. And user opens the video/stream
custom_steps:
1. When user presses and holds left or right button

2.Then the scrubber point moves to the time forward or passed until enter or pause button is pressed
custom_expected: 1. Then the user sees the respective instance of the video, either the earlier or later part of it

title: FF/Rewind with FF and Rewind buttons
custom_preconds:
1. Given user navigates to any video from home page or games page

2. And user opens the video/stream
custom_steps:
1. When user presses Rewind or FF button

2.Then the scrubber point moves to the time forward or passed until enter or pause button is pressed
custom_expected: 1. Then the user sees the respective instance of the video, either the earlier or later part of it

title: Play/Pause with Play/Pause button
custom_preconds:
1. Given user navigates to any video from home page or games page

2. And user opens the video/stream
custom_steps:
1. When video is playing the use presses play/pause button once
2. And presses the play/pause button a second time
custom_expected:
1. Then the video pauses after the first press
2. And the video plays as usual after the second press

title: Play/Pause with Enter button
custom_preconds:
1. Given user navigates to any video from home page or games page

2. And user opens the video/stream
custom_steps:
1. When the video is playing the user presses the Enter button once
2. And the user presses the Enter button a second time
custom_expected:
1. Then the video pauses after the first press
2. And the video plays as usual after the second press

title: Stat button
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched an archived stream
custom_steps: WHEN the user enables the boxscore/scoreboard button on the video player
custom_expected: THEN the box score and out of town scoreboard displays

title: Chromecast
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has launched an archived game
custom_steps:
WHEN the user views the quick action controls on the video player
AND the user is on the same network as a chromecast device
custom_expected: THEN the user will see an option to cast the game to their chromecast receiver

title: Switching between video feeds
custom_preconds:
1. Given user navigates to Games page

2. And user selects any archived game tile

3. And user picks a feed
custom_steps:
1. When user presses the down button twice
2. And navigates to the Broadcast Options tab
3. And navigates and presses enter on different video feed
custom_expected: 1. Then the stream switches to different video feed and audio is  different

title: Switching between audio feeds
custom_preconds:
1. Given user navigates to Games page

2. And user selects any archived game tile

3. And user picks a feed
custom_steps:
1. When user presses the down button twice
2. And navigates to the Broadcast Options tab
3. And navigates and presses enter on different audio feed
custom_expected: 1. Then the audio and commentator in the other audio feed should be different

title: Muting and unmuting device audio
custom_preconds:
1. Given user navigates to any video from home page or games page

2. And user opens the video/stream
custom_steps:
1. When video is playing the use presses mute button once
2. And presses the mute button a second time
custom_expected:
1. Then there's no sound after the first press
2. And the audio should be heard after the second press

title: Exit button pressed from home page
custom_preconds: 1. Given user navigates to homepage as an entitled or non-entitled user
custom_steps: 1. When user presses exit button
custom_expected:
1. Then user sees the following:
- MLB Logo
- Message: Do you really want to quit?
- Exit button
- Cancel button

title: Exit button navigates user back to page video is opened from
custom_preconds:
1. Given user navigates to homepage as an entitled or non-entitled user
2. And navigates to a previous date in the to Games page
3. When user opens an archived game
custom_steps: 1. When user presses exit button
custom_expected:
1. Then user is navigated back to the page the game is opened from
2. And the date of the page should match the date of game

title: Exit button navigates user back to home page
custom_preconds:
1. Given user navigates to homepage as an entitled or non-entitled user
2. And navigates to videos from any carousel
custom_steps: 1. When user presses exit button at least once
custom_expected: 1. Then the user is navigated back to the hero menu of the home page
